plans.title: Plans
plans.description: Subscription tiers that customers can sign up for
plans.helpContent: Plans define the different subscription tiers you offer, like "Starter", "Pro", or "Enterprise". Each plan represents a service level with specific features.
plans.helpNextStep: After creating plans, add Prices to set the cost and billing frequency.

empty.title: No plans yet
empty.description: Plans are the foundation of your billing system. Create your first plan to get started.

tips.tip1: Start with 2-3 plans: Free, Pro, and Enterprise is a common pattern
tips.tip2: Use descriptive names that customers will understand
tips.tip3: Add features to help customers compare plans

nextStepHint.title: Next: Add prices to your plans
nextStepHint.description: Go to Prices to set how much each plan costs and the billing frequency.

modal.nameHelp: Choose a name that customers will recognize
modal.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of this plan...
modal.descriptionHelp: Help customers understand what this plan offers
modal.featuresHelp: List the features included in this plan (press Enter to add)

plans.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this plan? Associated prices will also be deleted.

prices.title: Prices
prices.description: Set pricing and billing frequency for your plans
prices.helpContent: Prices define how much a plan costs and how often customers are billed. A single plan can have multiple prices (e.g., monthly and yearly options).
prices.helpNextStep: Once you have plans and prices, go to Simulate → Customers to start testing.

empty.title: No prices yet
empty.description: Add prices to define how much your plans cost.

createPlanFirst.title: Create a plan first
createPlanFirst.description: You need at least one plan before you can add prices.

tips.tip1: Common pattern: offer both monthly and yearly pricing
tips.tip2: Yearly plans often include a discount (e.g., 2 months free)
tips.tip3: You can add trial periods to encourage sign-ups
tips.tip4: Go to Plans to create your first subscription tier
tips.tip5: Each plan can have multiple prices (monthly, yearly, etc.)

catalogReady.title: Your catalog is ready!
catalogReady.description: Go to Simulate → Customers to create test customers and subscribe them to plans.

modal.planHelp: Which plan is this price for?
modal.trialDaysHelp: Free trial before first charge (0 = no trial)
modal.nicknameHelp: Optional internal name to identify this price

prices.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this price?

addons.title: Add-ons
addons.description: Configure add-ons that can be attached to subscriptions
addons.helpContent: Add-ons are optional extras that customers can purchase alongside their subscription. They can be one-time purchases or recurring charges.
addons.helpExamples: Examples: Extra storage, premium support, additional team seats, custom domains.

empty.title: No add-ons yet
empty.description: Add-ons let customers enhance their subscriptions with extra features.

tips.tip1: Add-ons can be one-time or recurring charges
tips.tip2: Common add-ons: extra storage, premium support, team seats
tips.tip3: Customers can add these to any active subscription

modal.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of this add-on...

addons.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this add-on?

promos.title: Promo Codes
promos.helpContent: Promo codes let you offer discounts to customers. They can be percentage-based (e.g., 20% off) or fixed amounts (e.g., $10 off).

empty.title: No promo codes yet
empty.description: Create promotional codes to offer discounts to your customers.

tips.tip1: Use memorable codes like SUMMER20 or WELCOME10
tips.tip2: Set max redemptions to limit usage

promos.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this promo code?

common.billingNotInitializedDesc: Please configure and initialize billing from the Setup page first.

entitlements.title: Entitlements
entitlements.description: Define feature entitlements for access control
entitlements.helpContent: Entitlements are feature flags assigned to plans. When a customer subscribes, they automatically receive the entitlements from that plan.
entitlements.helpNote: Use entitlements to control access to features in your application.
entitlements.confirmDeleteUsed: This entitlement is used in the following plans: {{plans}}. Are you sure you want to delete it?

form.keyHint: Unique identifier (lowercase, underscores allowed). Cannot be changed later.
form.keyError: Key must start with a lowercase letter and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.
form.keyDuplicate: An entitlement with this key already exists.
form.name: Display Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this entitlement grants access to...

empty.title: No entitlements yet
empty.description: Entitlements define feature access that can be assigned to plans.

tips.tip1: Use clear, descriptive keys like 'api_access' or 'priority_support'
tips.tip2: Entitlements can be assigned to multiple plans
tips.tip3: Check a customer's entitlements to gate features in your app

about.title: About Entitlements
about.description: Entitlements are feature flags that you can assign to plans. When a customer subscribes to a plan, they automatically receive the entitlements associated with that plan.

limits.title: Limits
limits.helpContent: Limits define usage quotas for plans. Track and enforce limits on API calls, storage, team members, and more.
limits.helpNote: Limits can reset monthly or be permanent allocations.
limits.confirmDeleteUsed: This limit is used in the following plans: {{plans}}. Are you sure you want to delete it?

form.keyHint: Unique identifier (lowercase, underscores allowed). Cannot be changed later.
form.keyError: Key must start with a lowercase letter and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.
form.keyDuplicate: A limit with this key already exists.
form.name: Display Name

empty.title: No limits yet
empty.description: Limits define usage quotas that can be assigned to plans.

tips.tip2: Set default values that make sense for most plans
tips.tip3: Use -1 or check 'unlimited' for no limit

about.title: About Limits
about.description: Limits allow you to define usage quotas for your plans. You can track and enforce limits on API calls, storage, team members, and more.
